page.title: 13SPORT IN BLANTYRE
page.content:
{Blantyre Sports Centre}was establihed in 1982. This was a great means of attracting many people from different areas to Blantyre. The centre has a variety of attractions. It has two swimming pools, lounge bar and therefore the Blantyre Sports Centre is a great attraction to many Blantyre People at all age groups and it is considered by everyone a necessary amenity for Blantyre.
There is also provision for bowling, boating for children and putting. Bothwell Castle Golf Course is positioned near the castle itself. Strathclyde Country Park is a nearby leisure amenity providing many sporting and nature facilities.
